Name: Fate of WINDSHIFT
About the game: Fate of Windshift is a J-RPG, Party Turn Based Combat game with an Open World Exploration with Full Night-Day cycle and treasure hunting experience. Welcome to ' The Country of Wind ' - The land blessed with warm wind and rich soil all year round, this country claims the largest territory in the world, various incidents occur on a daily basis due to thieves, immigrants and even demons. Up to four members will participate during battle. Some of the skills and weapons your character uses have unique attributes attached to them. There are also attributes in the battlefield. With effective abilities you can gain an advantage when attacking the enemy. There are over 100 Skills you can use to defeat your foes! There are also times when the characters or NPC will talk to each other during the battles. They may give you hints on how to gain an advantage. Be sure to pay attention to the “Character Chat” and speak with as many NPC as you can, they will help you in your quest Explore away! In the town you can find hints to continue with your adventure. You can also shop at the Arms dealer Armory store, Accessory store, seed store, grocery store and be sure to rest at the inn. Enjoy delightful music we designed specially to make your adventures more enjoyable, you can either play with any PC supported controller or with your keyboard .
